posts.post_title: Looking for an N28/29 or N162 HOFer
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Neal Kane
I am interested in obtaining a card from either of these sets -- SGC 30-40 only. Feel free to send me an email with scans of both sides and asking price. Thanks in advance.
